statement.p: Out of the last 45 days, it rained 17 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{45}}={0.37777777777778}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.37777777777778}={37.777777777778} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 37.78 .
